code.title: Model code
code.description: Code of the simulation model to be run

additional_properties.description: Array of two string items, the network file and the speeds file, or null to generate an empty graph

gtfs_timetables.title: GTFS timetables
gtfs_timetables.description: Name of the archive containing the gtfs timetables, placed in the GTFS feeds folder

time_log.title: Simulation time log
time_log.description: Log simulation time every 3600 seconds (used for run monitoring)

early_dynamic_input.title: Early dynamic input offset [seconds]
early_dynamic_input.description: Offset applied to the users origin time to make them enter the simulation earlier, in seconds

make_static.title: Make inputs static
make_static.description: Make certain inputs static, ie generate them at the beginning of the simulation.

oneOf.description: Make static the inputs with prebooked==True.
Make static the inputs with prebooked==True and don't generate the others.
Make all inputs static for the resolution, then remove prebooked==False from solution and insert them dynamically.

store_paths.title: Store shortest paths
store_paths.description: Store computed shortest paths in a dict to avoid computing them again. Either a boolean or a dict with the same keys as topologies and boolean values.

seed.title: Random seed
seed.description: Seed used for the generation of random events

multiple.title: Multiple scenario
multiple.description: Number of sub scenarios to generate

user_routing_parameters.title: User routing parameters
user_routing_parameters.description: These parameters are used in models including public and on-demand transport

objective_type.title: Objective time type
objective_type.description: Define if the user is trying to 'depart after' or 'arrive before' the provided objective time

max_nearest_stops.title: Maximum number of considered stops
max_nearest_stops.description: Number of stops around origin and destination considered by the users when computing journeys

max_distance_nearest_stops.title: Nearest stops maximum distance [meters]
max_distance_nearest_stops.description: Maximum distance accepted when looking for the nearest stops of origin and destination

0.title: Tramway route cost
0.description: Multiplicative factor of the time spent in tramways

1.title: Subway route cost
1.description: Multiplicative factor of the time spent in subways

2.title: Train route cost
2.description: Multiplicative factor of the time spent in trains

3.title: Bus route cost
3.description: Multiplicative factor of the time spent in buses

4.title: On-demand route cost
4.description: Multiplicative factor of the time spent in on-demand transports

-1.title: Walked route cost
-1.description: Multiplicative factor of the time spent walking

first_wait.title: First waiting time cost
first_wait.description: Multiplicative factor of the first waiting time. Default will use 'wait'

wait.title: Waiting time cost
wait.description: Multiplicative factor of the time spent waiting

route_choice_parameters.description: Parameters of the decision mode among different journeys

teta.title: Teta parameter (modified_berliaire_1999)
teta.description: Teta parameter for the modified_berliaire_1999 method

beta.title: Beta parameter (modified_berliaire_1999)
beta.description: Beta parameter for the modified_berliaire_1999 method

date.title: Simulation date
date.description: Date of the simulation, used for filtering services. Format YYYY-MM-DD
